original_text: And Achish answered David and said, “I know that you are as blameless in my sight as an angel of God. Nevertheless, the commanders of the Philistines have said, ‘He shall not go up with us to the battle.’
korean_text: 아기스가 다윗에게 대답하여 이르되 네가 내 목전에 하나님의 전령 같이 선한 것을 내가 아나 블레셋 사람들의 방백들은 말하기를 그가 우리와 함께 전장에 올라가지 못하리라 하니

sentences.original_text: And Achish answered David and said,
I know that you are as blameless in my sight
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 내 보기에 흠이 없는 것을

sentences.original_text: the commanders of the Philistines have said,
He shall not go up with us to the battle.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리와 함께 전투에 올라가지 못하리라.
